explains: adj. 印刷的；黑白混合的；用笔写的

sentences.en: One cat is black and white, the other solid black.
sentences.cn: 一只猫是黑白花色的，另一只猫是纯黑色的。

sentences.en: Someone had coloured in all the black and white pictures.
sentences.cn: 有人把所有的黑白图片绘成了彩色。

sentences.en: A knot of black and white cars obstructed the intersection.
sentences.cn: 挤作一团的黑白轿车阻塞了那个十字路口。
